// Core Pack A - General stealth tasks for party settings
export const corePackATasks=[// Social tasks (difficulty 1-2)
{id:'task-001',text:'Get someone to compliment your outfit',difficulty:1,category:'social',tags:['conversation','appearance']},{id:'task-002',text:'Make someone laugh out loud within 2 minutes',difficulty:2,category:'social',tags:['humor','conversation']},{id:'task-003',text:'Get someone to high-five you',difficulty:1,category:'social',tags:['gesture','celebration']},{id:'task-004',text:'Have someone repeat a made-up word you use in conversation',difficulty:2,category:'social',tags:['conversation','creativity']},{id:'task-005',text:'Get someone to agree with you about a random opinion',difficulty:1,category:'social',tags:['conversation','agreement']},// Observation tasks (difficulty 2-3)
{id:'task-006',text:'Get someone to check their phone while talking to you',difficulty:2,category:'observation',tags:['behavior','distraction']},{id:'task-007',text:'Make someone touch their face or hair',difficulty:3,category:'observation',tags:['body language','subconscious']},{id:'task-008',text:'Get someone to look behind them',difficulty:2,category:'observation',tags:['direction','attention']},{id:'task-009',text:'Make someone say the word "interesting"',difficulty:3,category:'observation',tags:['conversation','specific word']},{id:'task-010',text:'Get someone to adjust their clothing',difficulty:2,category:'observation',tags:['appearance','self-consciousness']},// Action tasks (difficulty 2-4)
{id:'task-011',text:'Have someone demonstrate how to do something with their hands',difficulty:3,category:'action',tags:['demonstration','gestures']},{id:'task-012',text:'Get someone to walk to a different part of the room',difficulty:2,category:'action',tags:['movement','location']},{id:'task-013',text:'Make someone count to three out loud',difficulty:2,category:'action',tags:['counting','vocal']},{id:'task-014',text:'Get someone to tell you their favorite color',difficulty:1,category:'action',tags:['personal','preference']},{id:'task-015',text:'Have someone make a sound effect',difficulty:3,category:'action',tags:['sound','expression']},// Misdirection tasks (difficulty 3-4)
{id:'task-016',text:'Get someone to spell a word backwards',difficulty:4,category:'misdirection',tags:['spelling','mental challenge']},{id:'task-017',text:'Make someone guess what you\'re thinking',difficulty:3,category:'misdirection',tags:['guessing','mind reading']},{id:'task-018',text:'Get someone to describe their morning routine',difficulty:3,category:'misdirection',tags:['personal','routine']},{id:'task-019',text:'Have someone explain a simple concept in detail',difficulty:4,category:'misdirection',tags:['explanation','detail']},{id:'task-020',text:'Make someone question if they said something correctly',difficulty:4,category:'misdirection',tags:['doubt','self-questioning']},// Creative tasks (difficulty 2-5)
{id:'task-021',text:'Get someone to imitate an animal sound',difficulty:3,category:'creative',tags:['imitation','animal']},{id:'task-022',text:'Have someone create a handshake with you',difficulty:4,category:'creative',tags:['collaboration','gesture']},{id:'task-023',text:'Make someone draw something in the air with their finger',difficulty:3,category:'creative',tags:['drawing','imagination']},{id:'task-024',text:'Get someone to sing or hum a few notes',difficulty:4,category:'creative',tags:['music','vocal']},{id:'task-025',text:'Have someone tell you a quick made-up story',difficulty:5,category:'creative',tags:['storytelling','creativity']},// Subtle manipulation tasks (difficulty 3-5)
{id:'task-026',text:'Get someone to say "you\'re right" in agreement',difficulty:3,category:'manipulation',tags:['agreement','validation']},{id:'task-027',text:'Make someone ask you a question about yourself',difficulty:4,category:'manipulation',tags:['curiosity','personal']},{id:'task-028',text:'Get someone to offer you something (food, drink, etc.)',difficulty:4,category:'manipulation',tags:['generosity','offering']},{id:'task-029',text:'Have someone repeat back something you just said',difficulty:3,category:'manipulation',tags:['repetition','confirmation']},{id:'task-030',text:'Make someone apologize for something minor',difficulty:5,category:'manipulation',tags:['apology','minor fault']},// Bonus tasks for variety (difficulty 1-4)
{id:'task-031',text:'Get someone to mention food or being hungry',difficulty:2,category:'suggestion',tags:['food','hunger']},{id:'task-032',text:'Have someone check the time',difficulty:2,category:'suggestion',tags:['time','awareness']},{id:'task-033',text:'Make someone use the word "exactly"',difficulty:3,category:'linguistic',tags:['specific word','agreement']},{id:'task-034',text:'Get someone to mention the weather',difficulty:2,category:'conversation',tags:['weather','small talk']},{id:'task-035',text:'Have someone nod while you\'re talking',difficulty:1,category:'body language',tags:['agreement','nonverbal']}];export const corePackA={id:'core-a',name:'Core Pack A',description:'Essential stealth tasks perfect for any party or gathering. Tested and balanced for maximum fun!',tasks:corePackATasks,difficulty:'medium',minPlayers:3,maxPlayers:8};// Helper function to get random tasks for a player
export function getRandomTasks(packId){let count=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:7;const pack=getTaskPack(packId);if(!pack)return[];const shuffled=[...pack.tasks].sort(()=>Math.random()-0.5);return shuffled.slice(0,count);}// Helper function to get a task pack by ID
export function getTaskPack(packId){switch(packId){case'core-a':return corePackA;// Future packs would go here
default:return null;}}// Helper function to get a random task for swapping
export function getRandomTask(packId){let excludeIds=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:[];const pack=getTaskPack(packId);if(!pack)return null;const availableTasks=pack.tasks.filter(task=>!excludeIds.includes(task.id));if(availableTasks.length===0)return null;const randomIndex=Math.floor(Math.random()*availableTasks.length);return availableTasks[randomIndex];}// Mock data for other packs (placeholders)
export const mockTasks={corePackA,getRandomTasks,getTaskPack,getRandomTask};
